name: This is Renton
description:
## Ready to Rock

An up-and-coming rocker needs a team to handle two jobs. A dear friend has gone dark, and the next concert venue has burned down. Things haven’t been coming up Swango recently but that the perfect time to bring in some outside talent to rock the opposition. Explosions, assassins, and rock ‘n’ roll are sure to happen. But that was bound to happen because … This … is … Renton!
